data.title: Stansted Airport Guide
data.meta_description: The Stansted Airport Guide - An independent Guide to Stansted Airport. Includes flight arrivals & departures timetable, terminal information.
data.text:
Stansted Airport Information

It's London's 3rd largest airport, and the UK's 4th largest. It serves nearly 28 million passengers a year, transporting them to more than 200 worldwide destinations.

The airport has also been awarded the Carbon Trust Standard!

Airport code: STN

Telephone: 0844 335 1803*

Airport Postcode: CM24 1RW

61km from London

Book Cheap Stansted Flights

* Calls to this number will cost up to 7p per minute plus your phone company’s network access charge.

Find a Taxi

Hop into one of the trusted taxis that serve Stansted Airport.

Rent a Car

Booking your car hire in advance can save you those precious £s!

Find a Hotel

Add a little something extra to your trip with a stay in an airport hotel

Who We Are

The Airport Guides Network; Independent Information for the Traveller

Your guide to the Airport - the Airport Guides were created to help the traveller find their way to, through, and from, UK airports. We are an unofficial guide and are keen to hear about your experiences at the airport, including the good and the bad!

Advertising on Stansted Airport Guide

Get your advert seen by the people who matter to you!

We've got plenty of advertising opportunities so don't hesitate to get in contact with us by dropping an email to us on enquiries@airportguides.co.uk or call 02152 367200.

The Airport Guides Network is a trading style of Fubra Limited.

This site is not affiliated with the official site and is an independent guide to the airport. We try to ensure that information is as up to date as possible, but we cannot be held responsible for any omissions or errors from changes we have not been made aware of. This site also uses affiliate links, where we may receive a small commission for purchases you make via these links.
